title: Ben Affleck is spotted back on his usual routine and is letting new girlfriend drive his car
text:
Ben Affleck admitted that he had a rough weekend.

But on Monday, the actor seemed calm and back on the ball, engaged in his routine commitments and checking his phone.

The Good Will Hunting star, 47, has also apparently taken things to the next level with his new love interest, musician Katie Cherry, who was separately seen Monday morning leaving his house as she drove his car.

After a rough weekend: On Monday, Ben Affleck seemed calm and back on the ball, engaged in his routine commitments and checking his phone

Out and about: On Monday morning, the movie star looked quite put together as he walked the streets of Los Angeles

It's the same dark Ford SUV that Affleck had lent to one of his previous girlfriends, 23-year-old model Shauna Sexton.

Us Weekly, who identified the woman as Katie Cherry, was told by an insider that they met on the dating app Raya and have been 'dating for a few months.'

Their insider claimed that the actor and the musician are 'very into each other.'

The outlet reported that she studied film scoring at Berklee College of Music and works as a film composer.

A source told Dailymail.com that the movie star 'has dated over the past year but this is nothing that serious at this time.'

Ben made headlines over the weekend after having too much to drink at a Halloween party on Saturday night, which resulted in a somewhat embarrassing video and photos in which he stumbled in the parking lot outside the venue.

While the actor publicly decried his behavior the following day, opening up to photographers about the 'mistake' and saying he wouldn't let it 'derail him,' the latest is that after the party on Saturday, he showed up to a casino in the small hours of the night and played a rushed round of poker.

'Yes this was a stumble and he is working to get back on track,' an insider told Dailymail.com.

The Justice League actor ended up at a Commerce casino at around 1 AM Sunday morning, after leaving the UNICEF Masquerade Ball in West Hollywood.

Behind the wheel: Ben's new love interest Katie Cherry was separately seen Monday morning leaving his house — in his car

She's driving: Affleck's new pal was seen in the same dark Ford SUV that he had lent to one of his previous girlfriends, Shauna Sexton

A clearer look: Katie's photo on Instagram shows the music expert with headphones on

He was accompanied at the casino by her who helped him out of the party, and who was seen Monday morning behind the wheel of his car.

That morning, the movie star looked quite put together on foot, in a plaid button-down shirt and thick grey blazer as he walked the streets of Los Angeles, California.

Affleck was speaking on his phone, also wearing denim blue jeans and grey sneakers.

Masked: Ben made headlines over the weekend after having too much to drink at a Halloween party on Saturday night

The actor sported a scruffy beard, but otherwise looked fresh-faced and well-rested.

In spite of his recent minor hiccups, which he on Sunday said will only make him double down on his sobriety efforts, Ben is quite busy not only as an actor, but also a producer.

After having won his second Oscar in 2013 for Best Motion Picture of the Year for his producing efforts on Argo, Affleck has no less than five projects on his docket as a producer, four of which he will be acting in.

By his side: According to a source at UsWeekly , his ex-wife Jennifer Garner - with whom he has three children - is worried. 'She’s upset but always supportive,' the insider said. Seen in 2013

One of those titles — quite relevant to his current circumstance — is sports drama The Way Back, about a former basketball star struggling with alcoholism who is offered a coaching job at his alma mater, the place of his former glory.

Affleck is attached to star as well as produce the movie, which is due in theaters next March.

According to a source at UsWeekly, his ex-wife Jennifer Garner - with whom he has three children - is worried.

'She’s upset but always supportive,' the insider said.

The Oscar winner has attended rehab at least three times: in 2001, 2017 and 2018.

His last serious girlfriend was Lindsay Shookus, a producer on Saturday Night Live.
description: Ben Affleck had a rough weekend. But on Monday, the actor seemed calm and back on the ball, engaged in his routine commitments and checking his phone.
